welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chiang Mai, a city known for its ancient temples, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy exploring the city's charm and beauty during your visit. Have a wonderful time in Chiang Mai!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
